data.text: @nihardesai7 @GuiperiniMD We need a cath lab STAT

In real life we’re friends 😉 
@AaronGoodman33 @GuiperiniMD @matthew_mei @smalveira23 @chadinabhan where are you? https://t.co/oqJoZwN9Df
@francis_ayombil @MarceloBellesso That’s where we are all watching the game! Let’s paint the bar yellow and green.
@GuiperiniMD @DrAEvens @GuiperiniMD you are a pot-stirrer my friend.
@AaronGoodman33 I’m running to the 🇧🇷 game in the morning.

In NOLA and it feels great to see old friends!
@GuiperiniMD @fabiopss https://t.co/u21omWyIKk
@chadinabhan @graham74GC @hematologo @GuiperiniMD I don’t know. They were at war for like 100 years. We are just soccer rivals.
@nihardesai7 @GuiperiniMD Home is where the Argentinian team is going to very soon!
@chadinabhan @DrLizBrem @DrAEvens @BuffaloBills @GuiperiniMD Everyone looks good in yellow.

@DrAEvens Yup. I totally agree! That was great retrospective data. Although the TRM with this regimen was higher than I’d like (9%, but including ASCT, 1 COVID death, etc) the overall outcomes were impressive for this population.

@DrAEvens @chadinabhan Too much to put in a single tweet! At any rate, that’s my opinion. I blame Chadi for asking a question that early in the morning and my brain didn’t go to ALL MYC-single hit NHLs (just DLBCL). In that case, I think you and I may share a similar view 😊

@DrAEvens Andy, I couldn’t find your reply on the thread. My response was specifically to @chadinabhan question on how I’d treat a MYC-single hit (I inferred DLBCL) not my opinion on this analysis. BL obviously demands high-intensity chemo. MYC+HGBCL is a more nuanced discussion. DHL=EPOCH
@nihardesai7 @NicoGagelmann @Torsadepointles No. No, it wouldn’t 😡. 🇧🇷🇧🇷🇧🇷🇧🇷
@marklewismd That’s the best captionI’ve seen in a while!
@AaronGoodman33 @chadinabhan @BloodAdvances @GuiperiniMD Well, I said R-CHOP for MYC-only, soooooo… 🤣
@Lance_Lassiter @chadinabhan @BloodAdvances @GuiperiniMD @AaronGoodman33 2%, which is the rate seen on CALGB 50303 and it was the same as for R-CHOP.
@Lance_Lassiter @chadinabhan @BloodAdvances @GuiperiniMD @AaronGoodman33 Deaths included COVID-19 related and I believe (have to review better) it may have included pts who received ASCT.
@chadinabhan @BloodAdvances @GuiperiniMD @AaronGoodman33 Why do you want to stir the pot so early in the day Chadi 🤣? MYC-only I treat with R-CHOP. Double-hit you already know my answer 😉.
@AaronGoodman33 @acweyand @AleckAmalia Be ready to be on a long line.
@matthew_mei @GuiperiniMD @paulocruzphi Don’t mind @GuiperiniMD , he only pretends he knows music, while thinking that Eagles is the best band ever.

@matthew_mei @GuiperiniMD @paulocruzphi Oh man, Abbey Road? How about Exhile on Main St, or Beggar’s Banquet or Sticky Fingers? Oh wait, I was thinking of a better band… For The Beatles it is Abbey Road, you’re right 😉

Way to go Morocco! Tonight I’ll be eating Tagine to celebrate 😋.
#FIFAWorldCup @chadinabhan

@matthew_mei @AaronGoodman33 @GuiperiniMD Getting in Thur night. @GuiperiniMD and I shall be looking for the best Sazerac so we can mentally prepare for Brazil’s game the next morning. You’re welcome to join our ranks, even if you pull for Croatia.
@AaronGoodman33 @matthew_mei @GuiperiniMD I see your point. I view it differently, but I appreciate your argument. We can even discuss it further over bourbon at ASH 😜.

@matthew_mei @AaronGoodman33 I wouldn’t either. So the question is: why would this be practice changing, but Shine not? Honest question. I wouldn’t use Ibr maintenance in either situation, and for young pts if I can’t do ASCT after induction (with at least PR) I’d still do R maint and Ibr only at relapse

@AaronGoodman33 @matthew_mei Well, wouldn’t it be a similar conundrum then? Who’s to say here that RCHOP/RDHAP without ASCT consolidation followed by R maintenance/observation and ibrutinib given only at relapse isn’t similar in OS to using Ibr maintenance?
A scientific debate should not be about convincing the other side to agree with you, but simply to make them understand your point of view. Dissent is important for scientific progress.
@chadinabhan @DrBonillaOnc @LeonidasPlatan1 @Dr_AmerZeidan 9 AM on Friday.Come join @GuiperiniMD @fabiopss and me to watch it!

@chadinabhan @DrBonillaOnc @LeonidasPlatan1 @Dr_AmerZeidan I think all those teams have a good shot at it Chadhi! No matter what, the World Cup is always fun to watch. Also, go 🇧🇷🇧🇷🇧🇷! I’ll come back to this tweet on the 18th 😉
@Dr_AmerZeidan I like your predictions!
@RahulBanerjeeMD @JoshuaRichterMD Gimme gimme gimme a paper by midnight.
@GuiperiniMD @HemSandoval @RockaDomicilioP @marchenajr They are awesome!!
@theRealFacted That was a relief for sure!
@AaronGoodman33 @GuiperiniMD @chadinabhan I think a piano or keyboard will be really easy to find in New Orleans!
@theRealFacted 😬
@chadinabhan @AaronGoodman33 @GuiperiniMD I’ll bring the popcorn Chadhi! 🤣

Let’s go mates!!! 🇦🇺🇦🇺🇦🇺🇦🇺
#FIFAWorldCup
@GuiperiniMD Co-sign on Dark Side of the Moon. I’ve been listening to the B-side of that record daily this past week. It’s magical.

Who’s going to win the #FIFAWorldCup ?
@chadinabhan @GuiperiniMD
@DanilovLab @LeonidasPlatan1 @Dr_AmerZeidan @DanilovLab I thought we were friends!!
@Dr_AmerZeidan You got it right!!!
Congrats Cameroon on a game well played. And that was the happiest Yellow card receiver on this entire competition!
@chadinabhan @ASH_hematology https://t.co/fKN6Ej5Rv6
@chadinabhan @GuiperiniMD https://t.co/t36Lbq9GIe
@GuiperiniMD @chadinabhan @helops79 I believe the World Cup was only scheduled around this time of the year as an excuse for us to watch it together at ASH with our international friends. #truth
@chadinabhan @GuiperiniMD @helops79 They certainly will, showed it well today. But so will Brazil 😉
@GuiperiniMD So will I!

Throwback to the Brazilian dueling pianos/drums takeover at ASH. Will we do it again this year?
⁦@GuiperiniMD⁩ https://t.co/6pa0xdTN5J

🍱🍣>>🍺🍻 and 💃💃
🥳🎉🥳🎉
#FIFAWorldCup 
@chadinabhan
@matthew_mei @BijoyTelivala Agree. Absolutely possible to do both well. Not all clinical oncologists are disconnected from research work either.
I had a busy start of the day, but then in the afternoon I had this super cute neutrophil legit smile at me 🥰 https://t.co/zCuxb72Gj3

I’ve received many different opener in emails from predatory journals (“greetings of the day” etc). But “Glorious wishes!!” is a first, they are getting pretty creative. I think I’m gonna steal that and use in my professional emails moving forward 😆
@GuiperiniMD @HemSandoval @hematologo @iHematologo @JulioChavezMD If there’s an option for CART if PD, I’d wait. If not, I think allo/haplo is a reasonable option if CR.
Final products! Pistachio + Pesto; Caramelized onions base + chèvre + prosciutto + hot honey; carbonara Pizza 😍😍😋😋 https://t.co/ICtlU1tfe0
Capping the long weekend with some homemade 🍕! https://t.co/xmbRUebrxs
@GomezDLeonMD Too bad I can only like this tweet once! Totally agree.

Sometimes I love the offside rules. ¡Vamos España!
@chadinabhan

@chadinabhan @anish_koka @BijoyTelivala @venkmurthy @drjohnm @NEJM We do know, however, from RCTs that both acala and zanu have a better safety profile (including cardiac) than ibrutinib, but data like these presented on this publication are good reminders that we still need to remain vigilant and follow patients carefully.

@chadinabhan @anish_koka @BijoyTelivala @venkmurthy @drjohnm @NEJM Exactly @chadinabhan . Patients in clinical trials are highly selected, which may underestimate some toxicities and sometimes overestimate efficacy, that’s why real world evidence like this remains important.
@chadinabhan @helops79 @GuiperiniMD @FIFAcom I’m a Mexico fan since I was a little kid 😜😜
@GuiperiniMD @Mohty_EBMT @TheIACH @ASH_hematology Inventiveness is Brazil’s middle name! Gotta make do with the tools we have 😉😂
@RahulBanerjeeMD @MediHumdani @Mohty_EBMT @ASH_hematology @Abdallah81MD @smbenlazar @Razan_Mohty @Anand_88_Patel Just count each elimination as an event on an OS Kaplan-Meier curve!
@GYamey Feliz aniversário!!! I love this album. A constant play in my house growing up.
@DanilovLab @LAPhil @DrDanPersky @LeonidasPlatan1 🤟🤟🤟
@Dr_AmerZeidan Just one one this list, but lived there for 28 years. Does it count as extra points 😁?

@AaronGoodman33 @ThatEricAlper The Rolling Stones:
Beggar’s Banquet
Let it bleed
Sticky Fingers
@BldCancerDoc Looks beautiful!
@majorajay @Jacawalk Here we had ham, Turkey and Paneer Biryani. Awesome mix!
@GuiperiniMD Brazilian watch party!!!

@RahulBanerjeeMD @ASH_hematology @Abdallah81MD A room??? You know that won’t hold all the fans!!! Let’s organize a watch party! Particular if Argentina is not in the Quarterfinals! (Because I’m sure Brazil will be 😜)
Happy Thanksgiving y’all! Smoked Turkey and Chocolate Meringue Pie, all done from scratch (including crust, ‘cause I don’t cop out) @MarciaSkarbnik https://t.co/jK9a6dObfd

@chadinabhan @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup Well, well, well… As promised, I return to this tweet after 4 PM to remind you that Brazil hasn’t lost a single World Cup opener since 1934. And still hasn’t!!! 🇧🇷🇧🇷🇧🇷🇧🇷
#FIFAWorldCup
@chadinabhan @helops79 @GuiperiniMD Totally unbelievable. What quick thinking! Where are my 🇦🇷friends now?
@chadinabhan @More_rog @GuiperiniMD @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup @helops79 Fun fact, she and I went to elementary and middle school together.
@chadinabhan @GuiperiniMD @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup Never!! https://t.co/06UuuWzgTw

2 PM - Brazil vs Serbia, World Cup
4:30 PM - Giants vs Cowboys
6:30 PM - Turkey time!!!
What a day coming up! Happy Thanksgiving to all!! https://t.co/31KtXM5H04
@chadinabhan Bose and Beats over ears are great. In ear buds are not the best at noise-cancelling

@DavidSteensma @VincentRK Some people found out that pandering to a specific group while blocking most others, inflates the number of followers by creating a mega-echo chamber. They stop presenting themselves as critical thinkers and create an acting role to get to their ends.

@POTUS Lots of talk about it, no action. Same “thoughts and prayers” again and again. It’s scary to send our kids to school thinking that this could happen. Do something. Stop promising and just do it.
@DanilovLab That’s an awesome show! Glad you enjoyed it.
Germany and Argentina losing? What a great Thanksgiving gift!🇧🇷🇧🇷🇧🇷🇧🇷 #FIFAWorldCup
@GuiperiniMD said it all. As physicians, we gotta be better than that. https://t.co/DnFAQgZrhb
@GuiperiniMD I share your feelings completely. I was very disappointed with that kind of behavior.
@chadinabhan @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup I’ll come back to this tweet on Thursday around 4 pm 😉

My boys asked mom to go to a Van Halen concert (proud moment#1). She told them they couldn’t because EVH died of cancer. That sparked their interest so they asked me to tell them “all about cancer” (proud #2) and we had a great conversation and that was the best part of my day.
@chadinabhan @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup I don’t know why people are upset that Argentina lost. We are partying over at my house. I knew from the start they were horrible 😜.
@VpwndF “The poll is not science, but I suspect…”. He needs to receive the lack of self-awareness award.
@DrLizBrem Fair point. You can always do one session of plasmapheresis to bring it below 4000 and then add R.
@GuiperiniMD @matthew_mei @VexFlexPerplex I agree with Matt. Patients with not so great PFTs receive BeAM in our practice.
@DrLizBrem If you are not using Ritux, I’d add it. Otherwise, 6 cycles of BR and then monitor if asymptomatic (specially if PR was achieved). If progression, Venetoclax is a good option - off label.

@GuiperiniMD Wait wait wait. You mean you want some people who play Monday morning armchair quarterback and just complain about trials that other people ran, to stand up and actually start contributing to furthering science that directly improves pts lives? Is that it? You’re crazy!
@GuiperiniMD Are you certain no Negronis were involved in the decision to count BTKi abstracts? 😜
@GuiperiniMD It means you have a lot of free time to count abstracts, my friend!
@GuiperiniMD @Ivaj960612 https://t.co/xaRl7j7qN0

I’m happy to share that Two sites within @NovantHealth Cancer Institute (Charlotte and Winston-Salem) can now offer CAR-T cell therapies for Lymphomas. The ability to expand our CAR-T footprint will allow patients to get the care they need closer to home #teameffort #lymsm

@NicoGagelmann I don’t believe the pre-recording is because the organizer doesn’t want to invest in IT. It’s to prevent connection glitches during the conference, which would prevent a the presentation from happening. In general, the presenter connects live after for Q&A
@chadinabhan I will buy them an Eli Manning jersey, as he owned TB12 twice 😉.

users.name: Andrew M. Evens, DO, MBA, MSc

urls.title: Finn McCool's Irish Pub · 3701 Banks St, New Orleans, LA 70119

tweets.text:
#ASH22

Anyone in New Orleans want to go on a run tomorrow morning?

@graham74GC @hematologo I will referee 
I’d it worse than Brazil & Argentina @ASkarbnik @GuiperiniMD
@GuiperiniMD 🤣🤣🤣🤣 I'm gonna cheer for 🇦🇷 from the safety of my 🏠

@DrLizBrem @DrAEvens @BuffaloBills You can watch that game as long as you watch the Quarter finals on Friday and Saturday #FIFAWorldCup 
I might just might bring my Brazil jersey but I don’t look good in yellow @ASkarbnik @GuiperiniMD

And showed the visual abstract from our Blood review (highlighting entities to left).

As usual @ASkarbnik, we are in violent agreement (eg, RCHOP etc for single MYC DLBCL but much more nuanced/difficult decision for HGBL-NOS, which this B.Advances study was trying to address). https://t.co/ohSyGpOHsL https://t.co/rU8s69p9fF

@DrAEvens Andy, I couldn’t find your reply on the thread. My response was specifically to @chadinabhan question on how I’d treat a MYC-single hit (I inferred DLBCL) not my opinion on this analysis. BL obviously demands high-intensity chemo. MYC+HGBCL is a more nuanced discussion. DHL=EPOCH
See my reply; this was NOT single MYC hit DLBCL; pts in analysis had either Burkitt or HGBL-NOS. https://t.co/43Xrw3OA2o

I dreamt last night, it's gonna be a 🇫🇷 vs 🇦🇷 #worldcup final and 🇦🇷 emerge victorious🏆

Wouldn't it be just perfect ?

#FIFAWorldCup #FIFAWorldCup2022
@NicoGagelmann @Torsadepointles
Vanc being added to coverage in already-treated gram-negative sepsis https://t.co/ygeZZWbqzm
@chadinabhan @BloodAdvances @ASkarbnik @GuiperiniMD Whatever @ASkarbnik says I’ll do the opposite.

@ASkarbnik @chadinabhan @BloodAdvances @GuiperiniMD @AaronGoodman33 Yes, I think that is right, but intent to treat. If the treatment doesn’t cure, then transplant required (previously anyway). Still high death rate. What do you expect or quote patients for DA-EPOCH-R?

@chadinabhan @BloodAdvances @ASkarbnik @GuiperiniMD @AaronGoodman33 In case Aaron doesn’t see it, I figured I put it out there. “This retrospective study shows that CARMEN is a safe and active regimen”. 9% death due to toxicity. Guess it’s relative, but seems a little excessive

urls.title: Safety and efficacy of a dose-dense short-term therapy in patients with MYC-translocated aggressive lymphoma
urls.description: Key Points. CARMEN regimen includes single doses of drugs delivered in 81 days (median), with good tolerability and lower risk of late toxicity.A 5-year OS of ∼

tweets.text: @acweyand Per @AleckAmalia Cafe Du Monde.  I will be going their daily.
@ASkarbnik @GuiperiniMD @paulocruzphi Ooh spicy take!  Too bad it’s wrong
@GuiperiniMD @paulocruzphi The answer will never not be Abbey Road for me
@ASkarbnik @AaronGoodman33 @GuiperiniMD Either of you guys there on Thurs?

@matthew_mei @GuiperiniMD @ASkarbnik This study gets rid of one toxic therapy (auto) and replaces with something else.  SHINE just adds therapy we know works.

Neither are truly practice changing if you read my attached tweet although this study better than SHINE which just confirmed the obvious.
@ASkarbnik @AaronGoodman33 Wouldn't be surprised if it is
@matthew_mei Did you know in SHINE ibrutinib maintenance delayed time to starting ibrutinib.

@DrBonillaOnc @LeonidasPlatan1 @Dr_AmerZeidan The better team does not always win the World Cup. You need to be good enough & have some luck.

1982: Italy was way worse than Brazil & they won.
2002: how did Zidane lose?

France & Brazil appear as the strongest with Spain close third. But, Argentina will win sorry @ASkarbnik

@JoshuaRichterMD 🤣

🎶 My my, how can I resist [that journal]?
@HemSandoval @RockaDomicilioP @marchenajr Liztomania is top 10 songs of a lifetime.

@ASkarbnik To win a would cup, you've got to play the best! Looking forward to it.

You guys got a little lucky not playing Spain next round! 😬😬😬
@GuiperiniMD @chadinabhan Maybe I’ll bring my guitar.  @ASkarbnik will you have access to keyboard?
@ASkarbnik I get it. If I were you, I'd be nervous on playing Argentina in the semis too!
@AaronGoodman33 @GuiperiniMD Can I be there in case the exchange turns violent?

What is your favourite B-side of a Record?

I have no doubt it is Magical Mistery Tour:
Hello Goodbye
Strawberry fields Forever
Penny Lane
Baby you're a rich Man
All you need is Love

@LeonidasPlatan1 @Dr_AmerZeidan Argentina, please!
We will be in Buenos Aires on the day of the final - would be great to see it there
https://t.co/KiwL5WTBP2
Chances of any Brazilian #ASH22 @ASH_hematology attendee attending any scientific session during the meeting while Brazil is playing a #FIFAWorldCup game is:
@GuiperiniMD @ASkarbnik South Korea wants to have a word with you….
@ASkarbnik @chadinabhan @helops79 This is definetely the craziest world cup! So many good games!

It’s Amazing that South Korea and Japan both advance to next round #FIFAWorldCup 
I love Brazil but @ASkarbnik @GuiperiniMD @helops79 know that South Korea will play their gears out…

And…….🤷‍♂️

Great meeting from my friends from Chile!
I`ll be there, of course! https://t.co/3C6bkLRKrt
@BijoyTelivala Sorry this wasn’t meant as a brag — other academic physicians see even more.  It’s just to say that not all academic oncologists are disconnected from clinical work.

Just because a procedure/study was done in a low or middle income country doesn’t mean it’s automatically wrong!

Prejudice is so exhausting. https://t.co/X2jV3rNHr9

urls.title: Targeting BTK with Ibrutinib in Relapsed Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia | NEJM
urls.description: Original Article from The New England Journal of Medicine — Targeting BTK with Ibrutinib in Relapsed Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia

@Mohty_EBMT @TheIACH @ASH_hematology Brazilian people are the best! 🎶🎶🎶

@MediHumdani @Mohty_EBMT @ASH_hematology Learning objectives:
 - To conceptualize yellow cards vs red cards using CTCAE v5.0
 - To appreciate similarity of Phase 1 trials and penalty shoot-outs ⚽️ when it all comes down to PK

What am I missing?? @Abdallah81MD @smbenlazar @Razan_Mohty @Anand_88_Patel @ASkarbnik
Saint-Saens Piano Conc #5 @LAPhil in a few minutes @DrDanPersky @LeonidasPlatan1  @ASkarbnik https://t.co/dUtQlAQYdz

@ThatEricAlper Nirvana

Bleach
Nevermind
In Utero

I recognize Insecticide was released between Nevermind and In Utero but that was not considered a full album and just a collection of unreleased material.
I did a thing for #Thanskgiving - made a heap of chicken biryani for our inpatient unit potluck #whenonservice https://t.co/x9BkmJBFB5
Classic half-Indian Major family Thanksgiving. #desi #thanksgiving https://t.co/4mQxU60MG4

There is no Life experience as being in Brazil for a World Cup Game.

At #ASH22, if you want to have a glimpse of that, join us Brazilians for a game. 

You wont regret! 🍻

Serious request: @ASH_hematology, can a room be set up at #ASH22 to livestream FIFA World Cup games ⚽️ ? Quarterfinals on Dec 9-10, one semifinal on Dec 13.

Great way for attendees to meet and to minimize 📱-checking during other sessions.

cc @Abdallah81MD and many many others! https://t.co/6WujiOOpac
@ASkarbnik @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup How will this tweet age? That’s the question.

Ok this Brazilian goal is simply unbelievable. WOW
@ASkarbnik @helops79 @GuiperiniMD #FIFAWorldCup
@More_rog @ASkarbnik @GuiperiniMD @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup Where is @helops79
I hear @ASkarbnik & @GuiperiniMD are busy watching @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup #FIFAWorldCup game cheering for Serbia.. https://t.co/zOyj6nqOtZ

Asking tweeps and twitterverse.

Best noise-cancelling ear buds? For phone, airplanes, etc etc 

Thank you
@VincentRK I don’t understand the flame wars.  It’s always possible to make a point without being rude or nasty.

Jill and I grieve for the families in Chesapeake and for Virginia, which suffered a terrible shooting at UVA earlier this month.

We mourn for those who will have empty seats at their Thanksgiving table because of these tragic events – we must take greater action.

Elton’s last US show at the Dodgers
Happy I did not miss it @ASkarbnik https://t.co/jzknfetQJy

I could never imagine people would be celebrating and pointing fingers when a drug fail.

We should always be extremely rigorous with data, but never forget we are dealing with people who could benefit from the drug. 

The drug has not failed.
We have failed our patients.
@ASkarbnik @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup Serbia is going to have a field day on Thursday…..::

I think it is #FIFAWorldCup @FIFAcom @FIFAWorldCup 
Shocking as I was thinking this was  Messi’s World Cup.

It’s why the game is played. https://t.co/RvvtCGJsd8
@ASkarbnik I’m afraid to add the R until IgM lower. Had someone IgM flare with a IgM of 3800 pre-ritux…
@matthew_mei @VexFlexPerplex Would you prefer BeEAM over BEAM?
I have a patient with Waldenstrom’s who has AEs on 2 BTKis, now on Benda. IgM down 50%, but stuck around 4500 after 4 cycles. Keep going? Something else! #lymsm

#PeriniPicks No. 10
Abst 1639
How Relevant Are the Control Cohorts of Clinical Trials in Patients with Newly Diagnosed DLBCL in a Daily Practice?

Great work showing that control arms of ND DLBCL studies have similar outcomes of real-life DLBCL that fullfill IC/EC of these trials

@ASkarbnik Just finished going through all lymphoma abstracts for my #PeriniPicks. 

Overdose of abstracts leads to stupid searches.

What does that mean?

Probably Nothing.

@Ivaj960612 I thought exactly the same...
Thanks God nobody really cares about them outside the twitterverse...

Academia fun facts.

Old & busted: you pay for abstract submission, registration, travel, housing, give up copyrights.

New hotness: you pre-record your presentation 1 month ahead because organizer doesnt want to invest money for IT.
-> shift of responsibility & time investment
@ASkarbnik Consider buying a Tom Brady jersey and see the difference ?
